front.title: Dynamic Feature Extensions to the Presence Information Data Format Location Object (PIDF-LO)

abstract.t: The Geopriv Location Object introduced by the Presence Information Data Format - Location Object (PIDF-LO), RFC 4119, defines a basic XML format for carrying geographical information of a presentity. This document extends the <location> element specified in RFC 4119 to carry temporal feature elements useful for tracking moving objects. It defines five elements, namely speed, bearing, acceleration elevation and directionOfObject. The document also specifies mechanisms to carry multiple moving object's status elements and proposes a mechanism to indicate the type of the PIDF-LO content.
